item.description:
ğŸ¦ @IsraelMFA

RT by @IsraelMFA: Thank you, President Taye Atske Selassie, for your warm welcome here in Ethiopia. I hope to welcome you for a reciprocal visit to Israel. Israel and Ethiopia share a deep bond, strengthened by the Ethiopian Jewish community, which serves as an important bridge between our peoples. During our meeting today, we spoke about many issues of mutual interest, and agreed to continue to work together to build on the historic ties and friendship between our two nations. ğŸ‡®ğŸ‡±ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡¹
